participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, often feels overshadowed but channels feelings into art.
participant_1.background: I'm not always the nicest person because I feel like I'm always being overlooked by my older siblings. I like to write poetry. I can read in English and French. I'm interested in learning more about how to use social media to advertise my business. I like to play video games to de-stress after a long day of welding.

participant_2.name: Marcus
participant_2.personality: Dedicated and practical, values family time and personal goals, and enjoys simple comforts.
participant_2.background: I spent hours walking around the city after my kids went to bed. I don't dye my hair because I'm too busy working to save up for my dream car. My weight is not relevant to this question. I love my family and I'm sure they would love me no matter what. My comfortable recliner is my most valued material possession because it gives me a place to relax and recharge after a long day of traveling.

content.text: Hey there! I am looking for someone to talk to.
Hi! I'm free to chat for a bit.
What do you do for work?
I work as a welder. It's a lot of work, but I enjoy it.
I've always been interested in welding. Did you go to school for it?
I did. I went to a trade school for two years.
Nice! What's your favorite thing about welding?
I like the challenge of it. It's also pretty satisfying to see something come together that you've made.
That's awesome! I'm glad you enjoy your job.
Me too! What do you do for work?
I'm a writer. I write poetry and short stories.
That's really cool! I love reading, but I've never tried my hand at writing.
It's a lot of fun! You should give it a try.
I might just do that. Thanks for the suggestion!
No problem! I'm always happy to talk to other writers.
Me too! It's nice to meet someone who understands the creative process.
